!3 Start !-MultiFormExample-! on Port ${= ${APP_BASE_PORT}+1 =} and wait for connection (ensures build is done)

|script            |!-SlimProxy.Core-!                                                                                                      |
|start process;    |cmd.exe|/c ..\..\Example\MultiFormExample\_MultiFormExample.BuildAndRun.bat ${TARGET_PLATFORM} ${= ${APP_BASE_PORT}+1 =}|
|connect to target;|Target1|localhost                                       |${= ${APP_BASE_PORT}+1 =}                                      |

!4 Start more instances

|script            |!-SlimProxy.Core-!                                                                                                      |
|start process;    |cmd.exe|/c ..\..\Example\MultiFormExample\_MultiFormExample.BuildAndRun.bat ${TARGET_PLATFORM} ${= ${APP_BASE_PORT}+2 =}|
|start process;    |cmd.exe|/c ..\..\Example\MultiFormExample\_MultiFormExample.BuildAndRun.bat ${TARGET_PLATFORM} ${= ${APP_BASE_PORT}+3 =}|
|connect to target;|Target2|localhost                                       |${= ${APP_BASE_PORT}+2 =}                                      |
|connect to target;|Target3|localhost                                       |${= ${APP_BASE_PORT}+3 =}                                      |

!3 Switch to Target 1 and add Alice (ID 1)

|script          |!-SlimProxy.Core-!|
|switch to target|Target1           |

|add entry                                                 |
|name |entry date|add?|id?      |working years for company?|
|Alice|1990-01-01|true|$AliceId=|>35                       |

!3 Switch to Target 2 and add Bob (ID 1) and Bob2 (ID 2)

|script          |!-SlimProxy.Core-!|
|switch to target|Target2           |

|add entry                                                   |
|name  |entry date|add?|id?       |working years for company?|
|Bob   |2016-09-21|true|$BobId=   |>8                        |
|Brenda|2018-01-01|true|$BrendaId=|>5                        |

!3 Switch to Target 3 and add Charlie (ID 1)

|script          |!-SlimProxy.Core-!|
|switch to target|Target3           |

|add entry                                                     |
|name   |entry date|add?|id?        |working years for company?|
|Charlie|2020-02-20|true|$CharlieId=|>4                        |

!3 Verify separation

!4 On Target 1: ID 1 is Alice

|script          |!-SlimProxy.Core-!|
|switch to target|Target1           |

|select entry      |
|sel id  |cur name?|
|$AliceId|Alice    |

!4 On Target 2: ID 1 is Bob, ID 2 is Brenda

|script          |!-SlimProxy.Core-!|
|switch to target|Target2           |

|select entry       |
|sel id   |cur name?|
|$BobId   |Bob      |
|$BrendaId|Brenda   |

!4 On Target 3: ID 1 is Charlie

|script          |!-SlimProxy.Core-!|
|switch to target|Target3           |

|select entry        |
|sel id    |cur name?|
|$CharlieId|Charlie  |

!3 Cleanup (Disconnect)

|script            |!-SlimProxy.Core-!|
|disconnect target;|Target1           |
|disconnect target;|Target2           |
|disconnect target;|Target3           |
